doc:
Roger Yuan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roger_Yuan 0 Roger Winston Yuan (born January 25, 1961) is an American martial arts fight trainer, stunt coordinator / performer and actor who has trained many actors and actresses in many Hollywood films. As an actor himself, he also appeared in Shanghai Noon (2000) opposite Jackie Chan, Bulletproof Monk (2003) alongside Chow Yun-fat, the technician in Batman Begins (2005), and as the Severine's bodyguard in Skyfall (2012). He is a well-recognized choreographer in Hollywood. Roger_Winston_Yuan ( born January_25_,_1961 ) is an_American_martial_arts fight trainer , stunt_coordinator / performer and actor who has_trained many_actors_and_actresses in many_Hollywood_films . As an_actor himself , he also appeared in Shanghai_Noon_(_2000_)_opposite_Jackie_Chan , Bulletproof_Monk_(_2003_) alongside Chow_Yun-fat , the_technician in Batman_Begins_(_2005_) , and as the_Severine 's_bodyguard in Skyfall_(_2012_) . He is a_well-recognized_choreographer in Hollywood .
